title: appengine/aetest: lack of StronglyConsistentDatastore flag in new packages
body:
The StronglyConsistentDatastore flag is no longer available in google.golang.org/appengine/aetest, while it was in appengine/aetest

This causes tests that rely on a strongly consistent datastore to fail, for us, this is pretty much every single one of our tests.

/cc @okdave, @jbuberel, @corollax
